DataElement.preferredName: EORTC QLQ-G.I.NET21 Past Month Feel Disease or Treatment Adversely Affects Sex Life Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of how often their disease or treatment negatively affected their sex life during the past four weeks, using a four point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: EORTC QLQ-G.I.NET21 Past Month Feel Disease or Treatment Adversely Affects Sex Life Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The aims of the European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer (EORTC) are to conduct, develop, coordinate, and stimulate laboratory and clinical research in Europe to improve the management of cancer and related problems by increasing survival but also patients' quality of life. There are more than 60 institutions and departments that have been recognized by EORTC as affiliated. These groups conduct, on a voluntary basis, laboratory research and/or clinical trials on all types of cancers using a multidisciplinary approach. EORTC maintains close working relationship with NCI and the British Cancer Research United Kingdom in London._A questionnaire intended for use among patients with gastrointestinal-related neuroendocrine tumors, who vary in disease stage and treatments._Past; before the present time._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._A question about whether an individual feels or felt that their disease or treatment has adversely affected their sex life._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire - Gastrointestinal Neuroendocrine Tumors 21
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The aims of the European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer (EORTC) are to conduct, develop, coordinate, and stimulate laboratory and clinical research in Europe to improve the management of cancer and related problems by increasing survival but also patients' quality of life. There are more than 60 institutions and departments that have been recognized by EORTC as affiliated. These groups conduct, on a voluntary basis, laboratory research and/or clinical trials on all types of cancers using a multidisciplinary approach. EORTC maintains close working relationship with NCI and the British Cancer Research United Kingdom in London.:A questionnaire intended for use among patients with gastrointestinal-related neuroendocrine tumors, who vary in disease stage and treatments.

Concepts.longName: European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer
Concepts.definition: A group with aims to conduct, develop, coordinate, and stimulate laboratory and clinical research in Europe to improve the management of cancer and related problems by increasing survival but also patients' quality of life. There are more than 60 institutions and departments that have been recognized by EORTC as affiliated. These groups conduct, on a voluntary basis, laboratory research and/or clinical trials on all types of cancers using a multidisciplinary approach. EORTC maintains close working relationship with NCI and the British Cancer Research United Kingdom in London.

Concepts.longName: Quality of Life Questionnaire - Gastrointestinal Neuroendocrine Tumors 21
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire intended for use among patients with gastrointestinal-related neuroendocrine tumors, who vary in disease stage and treatments.

Concepts.definition: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.longName: Feel Disease or Treatment Adversely Affects Sex Life
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual feels or felt that their disease or treatment adversely affected their sex life.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the disease or treatment
